title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XII, pt. 427 - Minimum Standards For Firefighting Personnel In The State Of New York-administrative Procedures
content:

§ 427.1 - Purpose

§ 427.6 - Procedures for basic fire training
§ 427.7 - Procedures for in-service fire training

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
